about_the_game:
Language: Simplified Chinese / English

A fantasy version of a turn-based combat game similar to the Age of Discovery. You play a bounty hunter and participate in the battles of various forces. During the adventure, you will meet other bounty hunters, and they will join your team or become your enemies. "Whoever is alive can see it!"

Bounty Hunter
Bounty Hunters Can Become Friends
Can be enemies with other bounty hunters
Some bounty hunters have their own storyline

Team
Choose from bounty hunters of several races / 8+ classes
Each race has independent attribute growth
Each occupation has independent skills
Each profession has a variety of development genres

Quest
Bounty Quest
Buddy Quest
Main Quest

Changelog:
2023.3.28 Beta0.3: Add game language (English) Add game characters / Increase item quality / Modify dialogue / Modify paragraph style / Fix bugs
2023.2.22 Beta0.2: Fix bug
